onboarding.question1_text: What do you like to do in your free time?
onboarding.question1_option2: I like binge watching shows or spending time on my phone
onboarding.question1_option3: Hanging out with friends and family
onboarding.question1_option4: Nothing much, I often feel bored
onboarding.question2_text: How do you prefer to be supported when you're feeling down?
onboarding.question2_option2: Having someone just listen to me
onboarding.question2_option3: Doing fun activities to forget my worries
onboarding.question2_option5: I prefer not to talk about or deal with it
onboarding.question3_text: How do you usually communicate with others?
onboarding.question3_option2: Carefully and with lots of thought
onboarding.question3_option4: Quietly and keep things to myself
onboarding.question4_text: What drives you to keep going when things get tough?
onboarding.question4_option2: Support and kind words from people
onboarding.question4_option3: Proving I can face tough times
onboarding.question4_option4: I often feel overwhelmed and give up
onboarding.question5_text: Who is the person you like to talk to or spend time with?
onboarding.question6_text: What's one area of your life you would like to improve?
onboarding.question7_text: What's a small, achievable step you can take towards this improvement?
onboarding.question7_option1: Reach out to a friend I haven't spoken to in a while
onboarding.question7_option2: Go for a short walk today
onboarding.question7_option3: Look at job postings or course listings
onboarding.question7_option4: Journal for 10 minutes about my feelings
onboarding.question8_text: How would you feel if you accomplished this step?
